verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kum ba yah, my Lord, kum ba yah.
Kum ba yah, my Lord, kum ba yah.
Kum ba yah, my Lord, kum ba yah.
Oh Lord, kum ba yah.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Someone's singing,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Someone's singing,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Someone's singing,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Oh Lord, kum ba yah.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Someone's crying,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Someone's crying,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Someone's crying,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Oh Lord, kum ba yah.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Someone's praying,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Someone's praying,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Someone's praying,
Lord, kum ba yah...
Oh Lord, kum ba yah.
